statements.query: MATCH (cluster:EKSCluster)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount)<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE EXISTS(cluster.exposed_internet) REMOVE cluster.exposed_internet return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (cluster:EKSCluster)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount)<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE cluster.endpoint_public_access = true AND '0.0.0.0/0' IN cluster.public_access_cidrs SET cluster.exposed_internet = true
